Replace.Text: Each time you convert a city (with a Religious unit) for the first time, earn 20 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture per [ICON_Citizen] population of that city. Poland's majority religion becomes the dominant religion in cities that loses a tile to a Polish Culture Bomb. Holy Sites gain standard adjacency bonus from all districts. [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relics provide addition +2 [ICON_FAITH] Faith, +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, and +4 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.

Conquering a non-free city grants a [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relic. Culture Bomb adjacent tiles when completing an Encampment or Fort inside friendly territory. One Military policy slot in the current government is converted to a Wildcard slot.
